apikey.title: Digitransit API Key
apikey.description: Enter your Digitransit API key. You can create one at https://portal-api.digitransit.fi/

user.title: Select Stop
user.description: Enter a partial stop name (e.g. 'Kamppi') or a GTFS ID (e.g. 'HSL:1303298').

pick_stop.title: Choose Stop
pick_stop.description: Select the correct stop from the list.

pick_route.title: Choose Route
pick_route.description: Select a route serving this stop. Choose 'ALL' to include all routes.

pick_dest.title: Choose Destination
pick_dest.description: Select a destination for this route. Choose 'ALL' to include all destinations.

error.no_stops_found: No stops found matching your search.
error.no_routes_found: No routes found for this stop.

abort.missing_apikey: API key is required to continue.
abort.no_routes_found: No routes available for this stop.
